Initializer# init(rawValue:)

iOS 7.0+iPadOS 7.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.9+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
init(rawValue: UInt64)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo/ActivityOptions/init(rawValue:)#see-also)

### [Initializers](/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo/ActivityOptions/init(rawValue:)#Initializers)

[`static var idleDisplaySleepDisabled: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/idledisplaysleepdisabled)A flag to require the screen to stay powered on.[`static var idleSystemSleepDisabled: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/idlesystemsleepdisabled)A flag to prevent idle sleep.[`static var suddenTerminationDisabled: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/suddenterminationdisabled)A flag to prevent sudden termination.[`static var automaticTerminationDisabled: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/automaticterminationdisabled)A flag to prevent automatic termination.[`static var userInitiated: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/userinitiated)A flag to indicate the app is performing a user-requested action.[`static var userInteractive: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/userinteractive)A flag to indicate the app is responding to user interaction.[`static var userInitiatedAllowingIdleSystemSleep: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/userinitiatedallowingidlesystemsleep)A flag to indicate the app is performing a user-requested action, but that the system can sleep on idle.[`static var background: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/background)A flag to indicate the app has initiated some kind of work, but not as the direct result of user request.[`static var latencyCritical: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/latencycritical)A flag to indicate the activity requires the highest amount of timer and I/O precision available.[`static var animationTrackingEnabled: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/animationtrackingenabled)A flag to track the activity with an animation signpost interval.[`static var trackingEnabled: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions`](/documentation/foundation/processinfo/activityoptions/trackingenabled)A flag to track the activity with a signpost interval.
